title: 2stout
author: 2stout
content: Even better than advertised!!!Â  Too bad I don't have the eclipse33 camera set up/studio.Â  MrMojo knocked this one out the park!!!

comments.author: StackItUp
comments.body: DANG!!! what a beauty My Bits are special congratulation one more time 2stout

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Looks amazing....this is one coin that I would want in my collections someday!!Â  Looking forward to newer ones that might come out of this awesome coinmaker!!!!Â  Â  Keep up the good work Mr Mojo!!!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Yeah I really like the looks. If this was silver I'd be all over it.Thanks for sharing your coin-experience and pics.Also, that hologram looks tiny on this massive coin.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: Kryptowerk on October 08, 2023, 12:22:56 AMYeah I really like the looks. If this was silver I'd be all over it.Thanks for sharing your coin-experience and pics.Also, that hologram looks tiny on this massive coin.The hologram is about the same size as the ones on the Squirrelbits 60mm, also this coin is a 60mm as well.Â  The hologram size is good as it's not too big, which would decrease the amount of space for art, and not too small, which would take away from some of the aesthetics.Â  MrMojo struck the fine, proper balance of art and aesthetics on this one.

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: This coin is so incredible. Such limited mintage tooÂ   Hold on to this one and grade with NGC if they will ever accept! Which I feel is coming public very shortly

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I have mine in a 65mm airtite with a foam ring. pics really don't do the coins justicehere is a quick video of mine. https://streamable.com/svlh30

comments.author: MrMojoRising26
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on October 08, 2023, 03:20:53 AMI have mine in a 65mm airtite with a foam ring. pics really don't do the coins justicehere is a quick video of mine. https://streamable.com/svlh30Good video mopar! thanks for the love everyone. I will do a pure silver 60mm merlin/dragon version in 2024 I will use the same characters but different designs out of respect for the mintage I don't want to devalue the existing coins.
